mapper.select: select r.*, d.name as "district_name", f.type from restaurant r join district d on d.code=r.district_code join food_type f on r.food_code = f.code where r.name like '%'||#{searchString}||'%'
select rest.*, d.name from restaurant rest join district d on rest.district_code = d.code where rest.no = #{no}
